title: Drawing, "Madonna Appearing to Saint", ca. 1650–60
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and wash on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in red ink, lower left: XXII.; in graphite, left margin: Scuola da Gerardino Siciliano.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Saint kneeling on steps is receiving a rope from Mary. Mary has descended in clouds, surrounded by cherubs, to pass on the rope. Angels and putti rejoice.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Madonna Appearing to Saint", ca. 1650–60.
ca. 1650–60. Pen and brown ink, brush and wash on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6871.
